mapper.select: SELECT "hihokenshaNo", "dataSetKey", "teikyoKubun", "shikibetsuCode", "kojinNo", "tokuteiKojinJohoMeiCode", "hanNo", "teikyoNaiyo01", "misetteiJiyu01", "teikyoNaiyo02", "misetteiJiyu02", "teikyoNaiyo03", "misetteiJiyu03", "teikyoNaiyo04", "misetteiJiyu04", "teikyoNaiyo05", "misetteiJiyu05", "teikyoNaiyo06", "misetteiJiyu06", "teikyoNaiyo07", "misetteiJiyu07", "teikyoNaiyo08", "misetteiJiyu08", "teikyoNaiyo09", "misetteiJiyu09", "teikyoNaiyo10", "misetteiJiyu10", "kokaiYMD" FROM ${中間DBのテーブル名} AS 提供候補 WHERE 提供候補."teikyoKubun" = #{提供区分} AND 提供候補."teikyoKubun" = #{特定個人情報名コード}
